chapters.title: Ekalavya's Aspiration
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a tribal prince, yearns to learn archery from Guru Dronacharya to excel in this noble skill.

chapters.title: The Statue of Drona
chapters.description: Rejected by Dronacharya due to his allegiance to royal disciples, Ekalavya creates a statue of the guru and trains diligently before it.

chapters.title: The Test of Skill
chapters.description: Ekalavya's exceptional archery skills are revealed when he impresses Dronacharya and others during a hunting event.

chapters.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
chapters.description: Dronacharya demands Ekalavya's thumb as guru-dakshina, which he willingly offers, renouncing his mastery of archery.
